column4: does anyone have an idea why xpdf refuses to refresh the bottom of the document area?
I dunno.... xzgv has also been working a bit weird after the Breezy upgrade
they both use freetype, I tried reinstalling libfreetype6, but to no avail
I think they both use motif, so I reinstalled that too, and same thing
I like evince... but I don't use many GTK programs, so it becomes a pain to load it, but evince works perfectly in the few times I tried it
I'm looking for another common depend between xzgv and xpdf
they both use libx11-6, but that's about all they have in common :(
can someone holler out to the MOTU's to do a recompile of libfreetype?
some of my libfreetype programs are being a little buggy after the Breezy upgrade
that, and libx11 are the only common libs I can see in the depends
(other than, of course, stuff like libc)
xzgv refuses to load more than a screenfull of thumbnails with `u' and xpdf doesen't refresh the bottom inch-or-so of the document
and freetype is in main, so complaining to MOTUs won't help - you'd also need to get a bugreport filed as to why you really think it's freetype's fault
oh that's right! not MOTU's hmmm
you have an idea why it's doing this?
